gameRules.name: Blackjack
gameRules.description: A popular casino game where players aim to beat the dealer by having a hand value closer to 21 without going over.
gameRules.objective: Get a hand value as close to 21 as possible.
gameRules.winningConditions: You win if your hand value is higher than the dealer's without exceeding 21.
gameRules.scoring:
+10 points = Dealer Bust 
+5 Points = Player Win 
-10 Points = Player Bust 
-5 Points = Player Lose
